name: HSP_DISCH_DIAG
description: The HSP_DISCH_DIAG table contains information on inpatient discharge diagnoses. Each record in this table is based on PAT_ENC_CSN_ID

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the discharge diagnosis for the patient.

columns.name: DX_ID
columns.description: Unique Identifier for diagnosis record used to document patient's discharge diagnosis.

columns.name: DISCH_DIAG_CMNT
columns.description: Free text discharge diagnosis for the patient.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.
